title: On the radio
author: VD
content_html: In case you’re interested, I’m on WNJC 1360AM in Philadelphia with Brian Greenberg at 5 PM.  I suspect we’ll be talking about the election and the various responses to it by the stock market and the new secessionists.
content_text:
In case you’re interested, I’m on
WNJC 1360AM in Philadelphia
with Brian Greenberg at 5 PM.  I suspect we’ll be talking about the election and the various responses to it by the stock market and the new secessionists.
